properties.name: [10-11] (from West Point)
properties.description: Posted by Skapunk60Leimen, Germany10th-12th grade, also this place saw the pinnacle of my life! Here we lived near Heidelberg, but my dad commuted- [10-11] because we were in our first house for one and a half years, then our lovely government decided to give up our block of houses, so we were forced to move into a house 300 yards away... which we could see from our window... while my dad was deployed in Afghanistan... spent one and a half years in the new house..

properties.name: [12] (from Leimen)
properties.description: Posted by Skapunk60Springfield, Virginiaback to Springfield! this time around I was fresh out of high school and had to find a place to work, and go to school! I ended up taking classes at the community college for three semesters. WORST SCHOOL EVER. Professors were all hit or miss. Also, bad allergies, poor winters that produced no snow. I needed to get far away- back to Alaska is my solution :)

properties.name: [13&15] (from Springfield)
properties.description: Posted by Skapunk60Fairbanks, AlaskaThis is where I live now. I go to school at the University of Alaska, Fairbanks (UAF). I put it as [13&15] because I live in UAF\'s dorms during the school year, but then I also live at my brother\'s place too (the one who graduated from West Point and works at Ft.Wainwright). This place is great!

properties.name: [14] (bro's 1st house)
properties.description: Posted by Skapunk60North Pole, Alaskabefore my brother bought a house in Fairbanks, he lived on Badger Road in North Pole- crappy place, I had to live here for a good part of summer 2007- I\'m just glad he moved into Fairbanks and invested in his own house

properties.name: [16] (from Springfield)
properties.description: Posted by Skapunk60Fairfax Station, VAMy first year back in Alaska my dad retires and buys a new house and I have to help them move into it when I get back on winter break. I put this in because it is a legitimate move as I lived here on extended breaks such as summer break

properties.description: Posted by Skapunk60Charlottesville, VAone of the worst places I\'ve ever lived, note: from the perspective of myself as an elementary school child living in a town with multiple thieves and hicks causing trouble with our family for being "new"...

properties.name: [6] (from Charlottesville)
properties.description: Posted by Skapunk60Springfield, VAloved this place when I was a kid- my views will change on this place later in life- great elementary school! Orange Hunt!

properties.name: [7] (from Springfield)
properties.description: Posted by Skapunk60Ft. Leavenworth, KSI went to Patton Middle School here- this school was by far the most technologically advanced/based school I have ever experienced in my LIFE- woah.

properties.name: [8-9] (from Leavenworth)
properties.description: Posted by Skapunk60West Point, NYDefinitely one of the most beautiful places I\'ve ever lived- [8-9] because we moved into a house that didn\'t fit us for 1 year, then to one that could the next year. We left my oldest brother here to go to the academy.

properties.name: [numberless] 85% of Summers and Christmases
properties.description: Posted by Skapunk60Greenbay, Wisconsin95% of my immediate extended family (most of my roots as far as they can be traced back in the U.S.) reside in this area of Wisconsin, from Bellevue to Greenbay to Appleton to Lacrosse... beautiful place
